name: data.webuild.sg
description: store snapshot data for webuild.sg for events and repos

scripts.build:html: gulp && jade views/graphs/repos-per-week -o ./dataset/repos-per-week -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-week -o ./dataset/events-per-week -P && jade views/graphs/repos-update-activities-per-programming -o ./dataset/repos-update-activities-per-programming -P && jade views/graphs/repos-per-programming-language -o ./dataset/repos-per-programming-language -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-group -o ./dataset/events-per-group -P && jade views/graphs/repos-most-active -o ./dataset/repos-most-active -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-day-of-week -o ./dataset/events-per-day-of-week -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-duration -o ./dataset/events-per-duration -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-time-of-day -o ./dataset/events-per-time-of-day -P && jade views/graphs/events-per-location -o ./dataset/events-per-location -P
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:graph
scripts.clean: rm index.html && rm -rf dataset  && rm -rf public/data
scripts.status: notes graphs tasks test views && npm outdated
scripts.test: jshint graphs tasks test public/js && NODE_ENV=test mocha test --recursive && jsinspect ./tasks ./graphs -t 30 -i
